title: New League Client Lag (HELP)
body:
I doubt anyone will answer but if you do..please hear me out
so awhile ago my computer fucked up and i had to reinstall everything including league
but ever since, the client will lag for ever, if I press play it will buffer and I can never get queued up.
Because of the new update I dont know whether its my computer or the client not being compatible 
{{champion:32}} I cri every night, pls I want to play League

replies.body: What do you mean exactly by buffer and never queuing up?  What's lagging exactly?  Does the Match Found notification pop up at all?  Any screenshots and details on this can help a lot.  Are you also using any third parties like play.tv at all?  Let me know!
i too had this issue with the new client, the fps was noticeably lower in game, but when i switched back to normal client all issues were fixed

Since I have a crap-top, the new client makes me lag in champ select. I can easily swap to the old client which works way better and wait for rito to fix it, but i have to change to the old client every damn time i open league. Its really tedious to go back and forth.
